Study Title: Trial to Evaluate Radiotherapy With or Without CBDCA in Elderly Patients With Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (JCOG0301)
Brief Summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate whether radiotherapy with carboplatin will result in longer survival than radiotherapy alone in elderly patients with unresectable stage III NSCLC.
Interventions: PROCEDURE: A: Radiotherapy alone|DRUG: B: CBDCA and Radiotherapy
Primary Outcome Measures: Overall survival, During the study conduct
Secondary Outcome Measures: Response rate, During the study conduct|Adverse events, During the study conduct|Progression-free survival, During the study conduct|Pattern of progression/relapse, During the study conduct
Collaborators: Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare, Japan
Study Design: Allocation: RANDOMIZED|Intervention Model: PARALLEL|Masking: NONE|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
